name: Nordenergi

goal:
Nordenergi is a collaboration between the Nordic electricity industry associations. Nordenergi Chairmanship rotates between the members in two-year periods. The association holding the chairmanship is also responsible for the secretariat functions.

The work in Nordenergi is supervised by a Steering Group consisting of the Managing Directors of each association. The Steering Group is assisted by a Coordination Group, in which all member associations are represented.
euInitiatives:
Emissions Trading Scheme ETS
Internal Energy Market
Network Codes and Framework Guidelines
Energy Union
Climate policies
Energy Policies
